instructions: In your Alexa App, tap Devices in the lower right corner of your screen. Tap the + icon in the upper right corner of the screen. Select Add Multi-Room Music Speakers in the pop-up menu Change Alexa name step 2 Multi room 1 Smart device group 4 Source: Clinton Bowman / Android Central and Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Tap Continue Select a group name or type in a custom name. Tap Next . Select the speakers you want for multi-room music. Tap Save to create your speaker group. Multi room 4 Multi room 5 Multi room 6 Source: Clinton Bowman / Android Central
